title: Get Started with Einstein Language Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1In your research, you've learned a lot about AI, deep learning, and NLP. What best describes what NLP is?

answers.content: A An aspect of AI focused on the interaction between computers and deep learning
B An aspect of AI focused on the interaction between computers and human language
C An aspect of AI focused on the interaction between computers and programming languages

wrongAnswers.content: D An aspect of AI focused on the interaction between computers and images

correctAnswer.content: B An aspect of AI focused on the interaction between computers and human language

questions.title: 2NLP has been around for a while. Why has there recently been a resurgence of interest in this technology?

answers.content: D Advances in deep learning have now made NLP more powerful, thanks to large datasets and increased computational power.

wrongAnswers.content: B AI is very popular right now.
A Spam filtering is more important than ever.

correctAnswer.content: D Advances in deep learning have now made NLP more powerful, thanks to large datasets and increased computational power.

questions.title: 3As the developer for Cloud Kicks, you're building the solution to automate the routing of service request forms. Which Einstein Language API should you use?

answers.content: A Neither API works in this scenario.
B The Einstein Intent API, because it analyzes text to identify what users are trying to accomplish
C The Einstein Sentiment API, because it analyzes text to identify the feeling behind text

wrongAnswers.content: D Both the Einstein Intent and Einstein Sentiment APIs

correctAnswer.content: B The Einstein Intent API, because it analyzes text to identify what users are trying to accomplish
